description:
LIVE Colour Permanent has been developed with concentrated colour pigments to maximise results for lively, vibrant, long-lasting colour and perfect grey coverage.

LIVE Colour Permanent has been developed with concentrated colour pigments to maximise results for lively, vibrant, long-lasting colour and perfect grey coverage. The nourishing conditioner with SalonPlex anti-damage technology restores broken hair bonds and repairs the hair from within for intense care and luminous shine.

Permanent hair colour

Perfect grey coverage

Lively, vibrant colour

Intense care & luminous shine

Nourishing conditioner with SalonPlex anti-damage technology restores broken hair bonds and repairs the hair from within for intense care and luminous shine
name: Schwarzkopf Permanent Live 7-98 Violet Red Hair Colour each
